# Getting guide documentations

Below are some documentation link.

(1) BIOS:

* Permission:[https://intel.sharepoint.com/sites/intel-uefi-continuous-integration-center/SitePages/Intel%20UEFI%20Continuous%20Integration%20Center/DOC2717806.aspx](https://intel.sharepoint.com/sites/intel-uefi-continuous-integration-center/SitePages/Intel%20UEFI%20Continuous%20Integration%20Center/DOC2717806.aspx)

* Manifest change BKM:[https://intel.sharepoint.com/sites/intel-uefi-continuous-integration-center/SitePages/Intel%20UEFI%20Continuous%20Integration%20Center/DOC2717806.aspx](https://intel.sharepoint.com/sites/intel-uefi-continuous-integration-center/SitePages/Intel%20UEFI%20Continuous%20Integration%20Center/DOC2717806.aspx)

(2) BMC:
